title: Add Stripe Connect login for owner with light blue menu styling

requirements.text: Add a Stripe Connect login button at the top of the page header that is only visible to the owner (CelestiNix) and allows them to link subscriptions to their bank account

quotes: Add stripe login at the top of the page
make sure the stripe login is for me aka owner to link subscriptions to bank account

acceptanceCriteria: Stripe Connect login button appears in the header navigation
Button is only visible when the authenticated user is the owner
Clicking the button initiates Stripe Connect OAuth flow for linking bank account
Owner can manage subscription payouts through the Stripe dashboard after connecting

requirements.text: Update the application menu background color from white to light blue throughout the interface

quotes: add a light blue color scheme to the menu instead of white

acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation bar background is light blue instead of white
Color change is consistent across all pages
Light blue tone complements the existing purple and pink color scheme
Text and icons remain clearly visible on the light blue background

requirements.text: Implement automatic owner badge assignment when the user 'CelestiNix' logs in, ensuring no other user receives the owner badge

quotes: when i login im instantly given owner badge no other user gets that if im login as CelestiNix thats me the owner

acceptanceCriteria: User profile with username 'CelestiNix' has isOwner set to true automatically
Owner badge is displayed in the frontend when CelestiNix is logged in
No other username can receive the owner badge
Owner status is checked and set on every login/profile fetch

constraints: Respect the existing single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not modify read-only frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve existing purple and pink color scheme while adding light blue to the menu
Maintain existing owner authentication and permission system
nonGoals: Changing the overall application color scheme beyond the menu background
Adding Stripe Connect functionality for non-owner users
Modifying the existing subscription payment flow
Creating new user roles beyond the existing owner role
